Title: Regional language film industry is booming: Neeraj Pandey
Content: Filmmaker Neeraj Pandey’s upcoming biopic M.S. Dhoni—The Untold Story, which is set to be dubbed in Marathi, says he is excited with the local language release as the regional language film industry
Author: IANS
